title: On Trendly Ground 4/6: Amir Locke, #RippingOffAmericans, Coachella, 'The Ultimatum', Dr. Strange, Palm Springs
itunes:title: On Trendly Ground 4/6: Amir Locke, #RippingOffAmericans, Coachella, 'The Ultimatum', Dr. Strange, Palm Springs
description:
In this edition of On Trendly Ground, Miles and super producer Becca discuss prosecutors not filing charges against the officer who killed Amir Locke, oil tycoons under fire for high oil prices despite record profits, Coachella sorting out their Kanye issue, the new reality show 'The Ultimatum', the new Dr. Strange trailer, and Palm Springs initiating a UBI program for their trans community.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
